messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

https://codereview.appspot.com/8660046/diff/4001/src/pkg/net/http/cookiejar/jar.go
File src/pkg/net/http/cookiejar/jar.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/8660046/diff/4001/src/pkg/net/http/cookiejar/jar.go#newcode32
src/pkg/net/http/cookiejar/jar.go:32: // An experimental public suffix list implementation is in the go.net
Why "experimental"? The package API should be
very stable (maybe some additions in the future).
Only the data might get updated every 2 to 4 weeks.

https://codereview.appspot.com/8660046/diff/4001/src/pkg/net/http/cookiejar/jar.go
File src/pkg/net/http/cookiejar/jar.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/8660046/diff/4001/src/pkg/net/http/cookiejar/jar.go#newcode33
src/pkg/net/http/cookiejar/jar.go:33: // sub-repository, see http://godoc.org/code.google.com/p/go.net/publicsuffix.
not sure it's right to put a link to godoc.org here. that's precedent setting.

how about just the package path.

sub-repository, "code.google.com/p/go.net/publicsuffix".

https://codereview.appspot.com/8660046/diff/4001/src/pkg/net/http/cookiejar/jar.go
File src/pkg/net/http/cookiejar/jar.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/8660046/diff/4001/src/pkg/net/http/cookiejar/jar.go#newcode33
src/pkg/net/http/cookiejar/jar.go:33: // sub-repository, see http://godoc.org/code.google.com/p/go.net/publicsuffix.
How about:

An experimental public suffix list implementation is in the package code.google.com/p/go.net/publicsuffix.

This wording fits the linkify pattern suggested in https://code.google.com/p/go/issues/detail?id=4953.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, r@golang.org, gary.burd@gmail.com, dr.volker.dobler@gmail.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e4f7ec1669aa ***

net/http/cookiejar: mention go.net/publicsuffix.

R=golang-dev, r, gary.burd, dr.volker.dobler
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/8660046
